snippet: “My father gave me a small loan of a million dollars. I came into Manhattan, and I had to pay him back, and I had to pay him back with interest. But I came into Manhattan and I started buying properties, and I did great.” — Donald J. Trump
abstract: “My father gave me a small loan of a million dollars. I came into Manhattan, and I had to pay him back, and I had to pay him back with interest. But I came into Manhattan and I started buying properties, and I did great.” — Donald J. Trump

headline.main: Verbatim: Donald Trump on the Rough Life, and Getting $1 Million From His Father
